title: How Italy’s Police and Army Compete to Enlist Italian Olympians
summary_full: Most Italian athletes at the Winter Games subsidize their training by joining the police or the military, which vie to enlist the best talent.
summary_public: Most Italian athletes at the Winter Games subsidize their training by joining the police or the military, which vie to enlist the best talent.
